import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import { CART_LOAD_PAGE } from "../../redux/actions"; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import ContinueShopping from "../shared/img/ContinueShopping_button.png"; import Checkout_button from "../shared/img/Checkout_button.png"; import Remove_Button from "../shared/img/Remove_Button.png"; const CartPage = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const [cartItems, setCartItems] = useState([]); let numOfItems = cartItems.length; let subtotal = 0; const incomingItems = useSelector((state) => state.cartReducers); useEffect(() => { dispatch(CART_LOAD_PAGE()); setCartItems(incomingItems); }, []); const formatter = new Intl.NumberFormat("en-US", { minimumFractionDigits: 2, maximumFractionDigits: 2, }); return (

SHOPPING CART: Your shopping cart contains {numOfItems} item(s) items.

{cartItems.map((item) => ( ))}
Shipping to You Price Quantity Total
{item.Name} ${item.Price}
${item.qty * item.Price}
{(subtotal += item.qty * item.Price)}
  Subtotal: ${Number(subtotal)}

SHOPPING CART: Your shopping cart contains {numOfItems} item(s).

{cartItems.map((item) => ( ))}
Shipping to You Price Quantity Total
{item.Name} ${item.Price}
${item.qty * item.Price}
{(subtotal += item.qty * item.Price)}
  Subtotal: ${Number(subtotal)}
); }; export default CartPage;
